definition: To release or discharge a substance or liquid from a container or system, typically by opening a valve or drain. This action is commonly performed to remove excess or unwanted material, such as draining water from a bathtub or emptying a fuel tank.

examples.german: Er lässt seinen Ärger an mir ab.
examples.english: He takes out his anger on me.

examples.german: Der Arzt lässt das Blut ab.
